name: ngx-material-keyboard-src
description: Onscreen virtual keyboard for Angular â‰¥ 5 (https://angular.io/) using Material 2 (https://material.angular.io/).
author: David Enke <post@davidenke.de>

scripts.install: npm run install:core && npm run install:demo
scripts.install:core: cd packages && cd core && npm install --silent
scripts.install:demo: cd packages && cd demo && npm install --silent
scripts.start:demo: cd packages && cd demo && ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:demo && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:core: cd packages && cd core && ng-packagr && cpx -p README.md dist/core
scripts.build:demo: cd packages && cd demo && ng build --prod --locale=de --progress=false --base-href=/demo/ && cpx -p README.md dist/demo
